code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: absence of other pathology causing symptoms

td.content: s:a 44 yr old m court reporter presents with Mental Health for past 6 weeks. o:Height 75 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.

s:44 yr old m presents with severe seeing halos around light, severe cloudiness in both eyes, severe blurry and double vision and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat x 7 days. Patient does not smoke he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 76 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, non-dilated fundus examination opacities seen in red reflex a:Cataracts p:performed non-dilated fundus examination, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:pt presents with critical double vision and critical difficulty seeing at night.
